org.opends.server.schema

Class CollationMatchingRuleFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opends.server.api.MatchingRuleFactory<CollationMatchingRuleCfg>
      • org.opends.server.schema.CollationMatchingRuleFactory
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ConfigurationChangeListener<CollationMatchingRuleCfg>

    public final class CollationMatchingRuleFactory
extends MatchingRuleFactory<CollationMatchingRuleCfg>
implements ConfigurationChangeListener<CollationMatchingRuleCfg>
    This class is a factory class for Collation matching rules. It creates different matching rules based on the configuration entries.
